title: core
text:
source

days_between

 days_between (date1:str, date2:str)

*Calculate the number of days between two dates.
Args: date1: First date in YYYY-MM-DD format date2: Second date in YYYY-MM-DD format
Returns: Number of days between the dates*

days_between('2023-01-01', '2023-01-15')

14

title: date-helper
text: This file will become your README and also the index of your documentation.

title: date-helper
text:
Developer Guide
If you are new to using nbdev here are some useful pointers to get you started.

Install date_helper in Development mode
# make sure date_helper package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to date_helper
$ nbdev_prepare

title: date-helper
text:
Usage

Installation
Install latest from the GitHub repository:
$ pip install git+https://github.com/tw13023/date-helper.git
or from conda
$ conda install -c tw13023 date_helper
or from pypi
$ pip install date_helper


Documentation
Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub repository’s pages. Additionally you can find package manager specific guidelines on conda and pypi respectively.
